snippet: Jeff Heuerman, the Broncos’ third-round pick, is expected to miss the season after suffering a major knee injury at a rookie minicamp.
abstract: Denver Broncos tight end Jeff Heuerman, top draft pick, is expected to miss upcoming season with knee injury.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Heuerman, the Broncos’ third-round pick, is expected to miss the season after suffering a major knee injury at a rookie minicamp.

headline.main: A Top Draft Pick for the Broncos Is Expected to Miss the Season
headline.print_headline: High Broncos Pick Is Expected to Miss Season
